issue_name: Threat Actors Exploit Adobe ColdFusion CVE-2023-26360 for Initial Access to Government Servers

1.description: The apache server has to be stopped in order to patch the system. This is done via: service apache2 stop

2.description: Update the whole linux server using the command: sudo apt-get update && apt-get upgrade -y

3.description: Upgrade all versions affected by this vulnerability. Keep all software up to date and prioritize patching according to CISAâ€™s Known Exploited Vulnerabilities Catalog.

4.description: Implement network segmentation to separate network segments based on role and functionality.

5.description: Require phishing-resistant multifactor authentication (MFA) for all services to the extent possible, particularly for webmail, VPN, and accounts that access critical systems.

6.command: Use a firewall or web-application firewall (WAF)
6.description: Use a firewall or web-application firewall (WAF) and enable logging to prevent/detect potential exploitation attempts.
